review_text: It was awesome very cozy n pieceful beautiful view of the lake awesome neighborhood

Went on an impromptu aurora viewing trip & thankfully found this wonderful, clean home to stay the weekend! Having two bathrooms and a full laundry area was a huge plus. The home is absolutely lovely, it is obvious a lot of thought went into the decor and the design of the spaces. It was so peaceful there.
The bedding is some of the softest and coziest I've experienced. The bath towels were super thick & absorbent. The bathrooms were very clean & had ample counter space & hooks. The furniture was all in very good shape and comfortable. It was nice to have so many reclining chairs available.
The best feature is the lake view. You can see it from the living room, enclosed porch, and the main bedroom. The view is spectacular!
If you end up staying here, know that you will be walking through uneven grass to get to the property. It was slippery after the rain, and I could see it being an issue for anyone with mobility problems. Otherwise, it's overall a perfect location!

Had such a peaceful time here! The main bedroom has a sliding door that opens up and you get to see the beautiful lake in the morning. The house has everything we needed and more, I would love to stay again!
Stayed for a girls trip to wineries. Beautiful view. Convenient location. House was very clean cozy. Thank you for the wonderful accommodations. We will be back.

Picturesque location and view on Lake Erie! My wife and I were impressed from moment one. We have 10 nightly rentals in another state and love finding places are like ours, unique, well thought out and well take care of. We have a team of folks that maintenance and clean ours so when we find a unit of quality we know it. No one will have regrets staying in this little adorable home!

The Lakeside cottage was perfect for a weekend away. At the end of the street, we were feet from the cliff edge of Lake Erie.
The home was clean and well stocked. The hosts were very fast to respond when needed.

My family loved staying here! The place had plenty of space for us, was cozy, and had a beautiful view of the lake. It was quiet and so relaxing. Also a short drive to all of the restaurants and shops! We would definitely stay here again.

We loved this cottage. Well appointed. Lovely enclosed porch with a wonderful view. Gas fireplace was a great addition. I plan to add one to my lakeside home now. (I have a wood fireplace). Response to questions very quick. Would absolutely recommend.

Very cute and charming lake cottage.
Nice view of Lake Erie, and all the main comforts of home. Would definitely stay again!

Staying in this vacation retreat on Lake Erie was a perfect pre-Christmas get-away for my wife and I. She wondered if we would be warm enough with the winds on the shoreline, but we were very comfortable with adjustable heating and cozy quilts on our roomy and comfy bed. And the unobstructed view of Lake Erie was magnificent. As we looked out there were no houses, parked cars, or traffic going by as we enjoyed seeing the ever-changing waters. The bright kitchen had every convenience including an excellent washer and dryer to the side. The neighborhood location was also ideal for us. Quiet side streets and an easy drive to both a large grocery store and the quaint shops and variety of restaurants in historic Ashtabula Harbor. This rental is not part of any resort, but we sure felt as if we were at one!
Great place to stay for a night or a weekend. Super clean and comfortable. Highly recommend. We stayed in the bridge view unit. Will definitely be back.
Cathy was extremely kind and made for a wonderful stay! Will definitely be back!
Nice little quiet place to relax and enjoy some time away from the city. Very peaceful and had everything we needed indoors.

This cabin was in an amazing location, overlooking trees and a river. Very relaxing sitting on the back deck or by the fire pit. Clean and cozy no bad angles from the windows. Worth the stay we will be back.
Couldn't have been happier to spend a weekend away in this quaint little cabin-was absolutely peaceful and loved that all the firewood was supplied! Thanks for a wonderful time!

What an amazing cabin! Cathy was quick to respond and helpful. We had a great stay. The pictures do not do the cabin justice. It is truly a beautiful spot with great views and a private setting. This cabin is within minutes of everything you could need, but you feel like you’re in the middle of nowhere. The inside is tastefully decorated and the craftsmanship shows in all of the details. We can’t wait to return to Cathy’s cabin for another weekend!

I don’t know where to start, it was truly breathtaking especially if you are looking for peace and quiet and some where to get away for a bit, this is your place. Cathy was so nice and helpful and very welcoming. The Airbnb was so beautiful inside and out, cozy inside and amazing view in the outside. Thank you for such a beautiful scene.
My family and I had a wonderful time even though it was only one day and night.🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰

beautiful cabin in a private peaceful location. cabin was extremely clean and hosts went above and beyond with the amenities. all the little extras were very much appreciated. Cathy was very helpful with suggestions and making sure we had everything needed. would love to return again!
This cabin was a perfect getaway for us. It was cozy and very clean. They did a great job making sure anything a guest could need was provided.

This was such a beautiful Christmas getaway. We couldn't help but fall in love with this place. Perfect location paired with impeccable cleanliness and a responsive, proactive host made it a very pleasurable experience - best of Airbnb, in fact. Thank you for everything, Cathy and family, and Happy Holidays. Many Blessings😊
cute little cabin that was well stocked and beautiful surroundings

Cathy took care of so many details small details with her decor. The cabin felt cozy for our night away right from the get go! We enjoyed a walk down to the river in the morning. We will certainly be back in the future!
Nice little cabin in the woods overlooking the river! Would definitely recommend.

What a wonderful cabin stay we had! This property is so stunning in the fall with the leaves turning and the chipmunks and squirrels chasing nuts as they fall. The cabin was gorgeous inside and out - just like the photos and even cozier than I could imagine. There are plenty of heaters to keep the space warm and such a comfy bed and couch. Highly recommend planning your next stay at this gorgeous cabin. The host is kind, helpful, and leaves clear, concise instructions so check in and out are a breeze.

This little cabin in the woods was everything my husband and I were looking and then some! Cathy had it decorated and cleaned so well we felt like we were right at home. So much so that we barely left the cabin the entire time we were there. She had everything you could possibly need already stocked in the kitchen and bathroom. It comes with a beautiful view and it was so cozy!! We will definitely be back!!! Thanks Cathy!!!

Beautiful property with close access to the river. The cabin itself was tastefully decorated with a great eye for details. Really appreciated the muffins, the wine, the snacks and providing us with cots since there were 4 of us. Not to mention a bunch of firewood! It was great, we had fires every night.
Such nice hosts and a very cute dog as well!

The Riverview Country Cabin is fantastic! I'd give it a 6/5 if I could.
The location is beautiful, the cabin is cozy, welcoming and has features above and beyond what's expected. We loved the bed loft, the heating, and the view.
Cathy was very communicative, helpful and friendly.
Highly recommend! We'd love to go back.
Cathy was a wonderful host. The cabin was beautiful and relaxing and all the personal touches were much appreciated.

Beautiful cabin with many thoughtful and useful amenities. The electric fireplace provided plenty of warmth for the cool nights and the bed was very comfortable. The cabin served as a great home base for this very nice region of Ohio.

Just left from a great 3 night getaway. The cabin is perfect for 2 and Cathy truly thinks of everything. There was wine and chocolates waiting to enjoy that evening while sitting on the porch swing enjoying the sounds of nature… She had muffins in the freezer if we wanted to have them breakfast. Multiple types of coffee and creamers… fire pit was ready to go with everything you need, including marshmallows. Bathroom was fully stocked with anything you may have forgotten. The town of Ashtabula has some really good, quaint restaurants. The longest covered bridge in the US is really close. There are 23 (I think) wineries in the area and are great places to spend the day with live music at most all weekend. We truly enjoyed visiting and will definitely return. Highly recommend
We loved our stay and Cathy was the perfect host

Cathy’s cabin was the perfect spot for us to rest and lounge for the Labor Day weekend while visiting family in town. Beautiful cabin, great attention to detail with amenities and resources provided within the cabin. Very peaceful and calming location.

The cabin was great with many unique decorative touches. The host went above and beyond to provide various amenities you might need for your stay. We enjoyed the beautiful view and a very restful night.

Cabin was amazing!!! exactly what I was looking for. Came into town for D-Day Ohio. Event was an easy 20 min drive away. Cabin was very nice, cozy and clean! Great porch with swing and view!!! Fire pit out back was wonderful as well with everything you need to make fire easily! Would definitely stay again. Also Bascule restaurant didn't disappoint either 3 nights in a row.

Wonderful time staying at the cabin! My wife and I chose this place for part of our honeymoon and it was a great place to unwind after months of planning. Cathy set up a great spot here. Great amenities included! Her little touches of providing chocolate and wine were delightful. It's a great location and so secluded, but with plenty of restaurants only a 5 minute drive away. Great place if you're a couple that wants to get away and unplug for a few days!
what a beautiful cabin and great hosts! had a great weekend, Cathy is very sweet and made sure it was a home away from home.

Highly recommended
Cabin was beautiful and cathy does an amazong job with the decore and even the little things ! Thank you so much
It was a wonderful stay, just as described. Thank you
We cannot wait to visit again! Cathy left so many special and thoughtful touches, from the Christian decor to wine and bread. Love the loft and porch swing!

Everything about our stay was wonderful! The picturesque cabin was beautifully and tastefully decorated. Cathy was welcoming, and friendly. We even had an opportunity to meet her, which was great. Thank you for a lovely and peaceful couple of days. We would definitely recommend to others and will definitely return.

Extremely cozy cabin! So many amenities and attention to details. We especially loved sitting on the porch. It was a beautiful, peaceful and scenic retreat. The bed and couch were very comfortable. We enjoyed going to wineries not too far away in Madison and a really short drive into Ashtabula for dining and entertainment at the historic harbor. Thank you Cathy for your hospitality!
Cabin was beautifully built and well kept! Host was very personal and met all of our expectations! View and surrounding were breathtaking! Sitting on the patio watching sun rise and set was amazing!

We booked the cabin short term for a long weekend getaway. Very nice secluded location with close by shopping and restaurants. The cabin looks even nicer than the pictures and has everything inside you can ever think of in regards to kitchen and equipment needed. The inside is decorated like a home and is very very nice. The host was very responsive and attentive. We felt very comfortable and enjoyed the stay very much. We definitely will be back!
This little cabin was wonderful in every way! Owners were great - they thought of every detail! Will definitely stay here again!
Above my expectations. Great views. Very clean.

Had such a great stay here!! Beautiful piece of land and great hosts. We took a walk down to the water and seen so much wildlife including a bald eagle. Highly recommend staying here if you need to recharge.
Cleanest place we have stayed at with Air BnB.
So cute and cozy! Great spot for a quiet getaway. The cabin was clean and had a great view!

Beautiful, quiet cabin nestled in the woods. Overlooking trees and a river. Cabin was cozy and relaxing. We loved the patio - perfect place to enjoy morning coffee or evening wine. The cabin had wood for camp fires, ample outdoor seating. Thoughtful plentiful toiletries. Simple cooking items (cooking spray, salt and pepper). Heating and AC both were great. We would love to return! The location was 5 min from grocery stores and 15-20 min from tons of wineries which we enjoyed visiting! To note, the cabin does not include a stove or hot plates at this time. There is a microwave, toaster oven, and grill outside. Just note this in meal planning!
Cabin was clean and stocked very well.Cathy was very detailed in choosing amenities such as shampoo to shower caps to lotions.

The cabin is very clean and it isnt thrown together with random stuff that you might see in other cabins. Cathy did a great job decorating and preparing it for guests. Plan on going back in the future.
also, the scenery on the grounds was great.
Great time had a lot of fun
This townhouse was so nice! It was so clean and up-to-date. It had everything you needed and the location was great. Super close to shops and restaurants. We had a great time. Highly recommend

This was our second time at Alexa’s place and we will be back. It is everything you could want in for a weekend or longer getaway. The place is spotless and it has more dishes to use than I have at home. Great restaurants are a short walk away and wineries are a short drive.
The house is gorgeous!! Check in and out was super easy. The host was responsive and friendly!! We highly recommend stay here!
Condo was just as described. Clean with everything we needed. Quiet and easy to find. Walkable distance from Lake Erie. Great place to watch the 2024 eclipse. Thanks!
Thoroughly enjoyable space!!

The personal touches made this space such a special place to stay. No detail has been overlooked. Truly amazing how much thought was put into every nook and cranny! The location is so fun, can't wait to come back!
Beautiful place! Highly recommend and Alexa was an amazing host!
We loved this place and the vibe of Ashtabula historic street. This is our favorite escape for a weekend and visit local wineries.
The place was cute, comfy and extremely clean!! Lots of games and books around for a rainy day and plenty of things to do within walking distance. We would def go back!
Loved our stay there. It was very clean and tidy. Would definitely stay there again, if in the area.
Much nicer than a hotel at around the same price. Was able to stretch out and relax. Worked well with my sister staying with us.
Great location just down the street from restaurants, coffee shop, ice cream, etc. Easy parking, very nice home.

If you are looking for a place in Ashtabula or the nearby area, Alexa's place is perfect. It is walkable to some of the areas best restaurants. It is a short drive to the beach. (I would recommend driving there since the beach is down a steep road and wouldn't be fun to walk back up.) The townhouse is on the main road in town but I wasn't bothered by traffic noises. The townhouse itself is brand new and the furnishings are top of the line. The beds were comfortable and there is enough furniture in the living room for everyone to spread out. My visit was during the winter, so we didn't get to take advantage of the two outside areas. Alexa provides a great house manual that includes restaurant recommendations. I loved Fitzgerald's Wine bar and Rennick Meat Market.

Alexa's place was right near the main street in Ashtabula and walking distance to Lake Erie access as well as many fine restaurants and shops. We came in the winter and would like to try it again when the weather is warmer.

Look no further. If you’re wanting to experience all that Ashtabula has to offer in a great location, not to mention the fact that the townhome is gorgeous, then book this. As an Ashtabula native that visits family often, I know where I’m staying going forward! Alexa is a perfect host as well!
We had a great trip.

The place is just immaculate! We have stayed in many nice AB&Bs, this one tops them. Perfect for a long weekend to explore culinary downtown Ashtebula by foot.
5 minutes walk to downtown Ashtebula, Felix Pizza, Rennick meat market (both with great food) and several other options and bars. Also 5 min walking to Fire Chicken (also good).
The home was SO beautiful and clean. Such a great and safe location with so much to do around it!

We really enjoyed our stay. Host was so responsive and extremely helpful. Townhouse was clean and a great location for easily getting to every place we needed to go. Would highly recommend and stay here again.

This location- a historic small town harbor- was exactly what we were looking for for a couples getaway. There are so many nice, fine dining restaurants to choose from- 2 days was not enough time to try them all. The historic harbor and downtown is so charming, even in a colder month where temps were in the 40s, we absolutely loved it!! We always felt safe and the location was perfect, you seriously can't get a better stay than these townhouses.
In regards to the actual airBNB- quite possibly the cleanest one we've stayed in and for sure the most cozy and attentive. The townhouse was so clean when we arrived with added touches: STOCKED tea&coffee bar, snacks, beach wagon, things to do recommendations, fully stocked kitchen, enough bath towels and wash cloths, pillows and blankets...etc.). The host also provides a lot of friends and couples games to pass time. The host was so quick to answer questions and reply to messages. We look forward to future stays here.
Extremely clean and comfortable. Highly recommended.
Excellent rental. Would definitely use again!

This listing was perfect for us. The provided amenities were a nice touch. Included coffee and add-ins. A welcome snack basket was a nice surprise. There were even several books and assorted games in the unit for relaxation and entertainment. All cleaning products were provided for doing the dishes, trash bags, even a dust buster vac for small clean ups. Very spacious. They were responsive regarding the code to enter. It had changed from the one I was advised of in the original reservation. Would highly recommend.

This was our second time staying here and it was just as we remembered it. The townhouse is beautiful and very clean. It's in the perfect location to walk to the restaurants in town. We can't wait to come back again.

We stayed in a Ashtabula during Labor Day Weekend. First time at Lake Erie in Ohio and we had a great time. Our 3-year old loved watching the bascule bridge open and close, and watching the ships go through.
Ashtabula Harbor had a great selection of restaurants and stores. Less busy and touristy than Geneva on the Lake.
We enjoyed playing at Walnut Beach and strolling along Walnut Boulevard to see some of the historic homes in the town.
Short drive to both Geneva and Conneaut along Lake Rd for some great views of Lake Erie. We only stayed for a weekend but there seemed to be a lot to do if you stay a week.
Thanks Alexa, for hosting us!

Our stay at Alexa's was excellent. Communication with Alexa was swift and pleasant.
We have stayed in AirBnB rentals in a number of locations in the US and France and Alexa's is definitely 5 star. The space is beautiful and is exactly as shown in the photos. Entry into the house was very simple with explicit directions from Alexa prior to arrival.
The entire house was superbly clean, the amenities in the kitchen were very welcome, the beds were comfy, and there was plenty of hot water. The only thing we lacked in the kitchen was a tea kettle.
The house is excellently located, easy to find, with a lovely 2 car locked garage, and in walking distance to some very nice restaurants.
All in all, we had a brilliant time. We highly recommend Alexa's AirBnB and would happily book another stay here next year.
Extremely clean and spacious. Great location.

The place was beautiful,a little pricey for how late check in is and how early check out is.The location is good if you want to park and walk to shops and restaurants on Bridge Street.The Harbor is beautiful at night.

Everything about the condo was great!!! Neat, clean, we’ll stocked!!! And the little extras (like the snacks) were greatly appreciated!!! We loved our time there and would like to go again soon!!! Thanks
Such a fun and relaxing stay! Loved the little town nearby and it was perfect for my sister and our partners. Excited to stay again next year!
Great location and beautiful, comfortable accommodations!
The condo was absolutely beautiful, gorgeous kitchen, and everything was spotless! Will be back and we highly recommend this condo!

This place was so cute and perfect for a short getaway off the beaten path. The apartment is pristine and has updated amenities and a very nice kitchen. We spent time at the Cloven Hoof brewery down the street and the underground railroad museum up the hill, as well as the downtown area. Highly recommend!

Absolutely loved everything about this Airbnb. From the decor to the amenities to the location. You won’t find a nicer place to stay in Ohio.
They’ve thought of everything that you would need to make your stay comfortable and fun. It’s all brand new and impeccably clean. I LOVED it. Alexa the host is without a doubt the most kind host I’ve ever had. I will only stay at her properties when I fly to Ohio. Her attention to detail is unsurpassed and her eye for style and decor can’t be beat. It’s located in a cute spot called the Harbor. The Rennick Meat Market restaurant is fantastic along with Briquettes BBQ’s brisket is quite possibly the best bbq I’ve ever had. This place is a must stay for a special weekend celebration. Lots to see and do.

Loved the modern feel of this place and it was plenty big! My favorite was the kitchen /living room area . Nice place to sit, relax, and make coffee.
I also love the restaurants within walking distance. I used to live in Ashtabula and this was a trip to visit family.
The pictures matched the actual apartment!

Beautiful. I booked this as part of a bday weekend for my babe. We had a great stay. I cooked delicious meal and although I brought a few items, the kitchen had everything I needed and more. I felt right at home.
The place was spotless and smelled great. We had a great nights rest. We slept on the first floor and the sheets were sooooo soft and felt so good.
I forgot to bring some games, but there were a few provided which was nice and fun! We played a game for couples.
The area was nice and quiet, perfect for relaxing and quality time.
I would definitely book again.
Welcoming host and we found the home pristine and equipped with everything we needed while in town to visit with family. Recommended!

Alexa’s place was fantastic photos don’t do justice for how spacious the place is. 0 complaints everything was perfect with every amenity you could need I wanted a long term stay but unfortunately had to move again for work would highly recommend.

We had an amazing stay! Alexa was very responsive and accommodating! The place had everything we could need and more. The place was clean and neat. Restaurants and breweries in walking distance! Our favorite was Nights and Weekends pizza place. Highly recommend staying here!

This place was brand new and beautiful. What I liked best was the little touches - a snack basket, plenty of toiletries for things we needed or forgot, the hammock to be hung on a stand on the back patio, a fully stocked kitchen and spice rack. We didn’t use them but there was even a wagon in the garage to easily pull beach stuff to the lake, books, games and a bluetooth speaker. The garage was really appreciated to tuck our car in over night.
It’s on a busy street, so some traffic noise in main living area, but both bedrooms are on the back side of the townhouse and quiet enough.

I absolutely loved staying here! The place is gorgeous. We were a last minute booking and Alexa was quick to respond and checked in with us to make sure we were comfortable. The place felt very homey and was so clean. It has my favorite coffee spot on the same street and some yummy food spots too! Definitely looking to book again in the summer since it's close to the beach. 11/10!

This was one of the best AirBnB or VRBO rentals have we have stayed at. My husband and I have OCD on cleanliness and the place was spotless. We love to cook and the rental was stocked with everything we needed. Great location and wonderful host. We absolutely loved it!
Alexa’s listed was exactly as described. Beautiful accommodations and so clean! Loved out stay and would recommend to anyone!
GREAT place! Super clean and nice! Within walking distance of restaurants and shops. Would definitely book again!
We had a great experience and will definitely consider staying at this location again in the future!

Loved staying here with friends! It’s within short driving distance to all the wineries, and a quick walk for amazing food. Photos are very accurate and I felt right at home! Wish I could give this place 6/5 stars.

I would highly recommend this condo. It is practically brand new and I've never seen an air bnb so clean. Hosts are very responsive. Kitchen has everything you could need. 3 huge tvs and a smart home. Note..the stairs are pretty steep but expected for a townhouse. Only 1 bed and bath on first floir.

I would highly recommend and return to this townhouse. It is very clean and right down where you can walk to amazing businesses in this cute little town. The kitchen is absolutely beautiful and has everything you need. The beds were comfortable. Alexa did quickly respond with any questions I had. We were absolutely impressed.
Alexa was amazing! I had a question and Alexa responded immediately. Great experience overall!

We were in town to visit family over the holiday and found this gem. The townhome is brand new, with all the amenities needed, and sparkling clean. Close to great restaurants and shops in the harbor area. We didn't need anything but the host checked in to be sure all was going well. We have already booked our next stay!
This townhome was exactly what we were looking for and actually exceeded expectations. We will definitely visit again!
Alexis made everything so perfect and the stay was very nice!
Beautiful clean place to stay!
Beautiful place!

The townhouse was more than what we expected. It was beautiful & in a perfect location that you can walk to town & enjoy all the local restaurants & shops. Alexa was so easy to work with. We can't wait to come back and share with more friends.
This luxurious townhouse was the perfect getaway for a mother/daughter weekend. The home is centrally located to restaurants, shops and beautiful Lake Erie.
Beautiful townhome in a great location. We felt welcomed and Alexa had everything you may need! Super clean, super comfortable, loved the cozy bed and blankets.
Great spot, will use on our next trip to Ashtabula. Easy check in/out, beautiful spot.
Thanks for having us and responding to us with the late notice. I appreciate that very much. The place was clean and clutter free. It served the purpose.
Thank you for the hospitality. The surrounding areas and place itself are beautiful!
Ample parking great location walkable to town and beach but most delightful was the view off the back patio of the lake and beautiful sunsets

A wonderful place to stay, especially for a large family. We felt very comfortable there and loved how close it was to the park, beach, and lake. Everything was clean and I appreciated all the board games to choose from for a family game night. My favorite amenity was the filtered ice water from the fridge door. We definitely want to come back some time!
Nice place close to the lake.
We had a great time. The house was great. There was a book with different things to do and there was also a book that you could write a message which was really cute!

We loved our stay! It was the perfect place for our two families to spend a relaxing weekend. The outdoor area was great for the kids to play and for hanging out at the fire pit in the evening.
The home is just like the pictures and an excellent layout for hanging out with the family. The kitchen is fully equipped for meal prep and there is plenty of table space for everyone to enjoy a meal together.
This place is close enough to the beach to walk or bike ride (but also plenty of parking if you're driving). The beach is gorgeous and has a lovely playground too. We also tried out several of the recommended restaurants and they we excellent.
The hosts made everything easy from booking to check out. They were welcoming and informative. They supplied the house with so many extras - coffee and fire wood were our favorites - and made great recommendations.
This is a wonderful choice for a fun, relaxing weekend! Highly recommend!
Great stay and walkable to the water and the local town where there are bars and restaurants. We really enjoyed our stay!

Great location, house was well well appointed, lots of updates, very homey feeling. Walking distance to good restaurants and bars. Suited our large group of brothers and nephews perfectly. Would highly recommend!

Loved our stay at the walnut beach inn. The house was clean and comfortable. Location was perfect. We loved being so close to walnut beach and the surrounding restaurants and stores. It was very quiet and everyone we met was so friendly. Our kids didn’t want to leave! We will definitely be back!
We loved our stay at Walnut Beach Inn. The best part was the proximity to not only the beach but also the harbor. We look forward to booking again!

Dave and Kate were excellent hosts! We came for a mini-family reunion and it was a perfect spot! The house was great and super clean! Dave and Kate left a detailed guidebook to recommend things to do and places to eat. They were super helpful and so kind! We are looking forward to coming back!!
We loved the location - close to a beach, park, downtown, restaurants, coffeeshops, fishing, and boating. The hosts were very responsive and gave needed instructions.
Great house, lots of space, firewood and grill were wonderful extras
This place was perfect! Great location, great walk to town, great walk to the beach, great for a morning walk. We drove the short trip to Geneva on the Lake. We’ll be back!
Awesome location house is super clean. Enjoy our stay.
Very clean and great location.
Clean and spacious, this was a great space for us. It was within walking distance to the beach and great food and shops, but still in a quiet neighborhood. Thank you!

Dave and Kate were the best hosts that I have dealt with on Airbnb thus far. Their communication is excellent and they get back to you immediately and they are very friendly! Their house was very comfortable, clean and spacious for our group of 8 women for a getaway weekend. We loved the huge kitchen table for gathering, beds were comfortable, and the location was great for walking to the beach and town to shops and restaurants. We planned on using the fire pit, but never got around to it. We cooked in the equipped kitchen. Dave and Kate even ordered a 13x9 pan to deliver before our arrival via Amazon, because they weren’t sure if the kitchen included one. That was so thoughtful and helpful for the breakfast bakes I made. If I am ever in the area again, I would stay at this house again.
Dave and Kate were extremely helpful with any questions I had. This was in a great area, close to Geneva on the lake, and had the beach basically in the backyard!

The house was SPOTLESS. Unfortunately for us the weather was not so great during our stay but the house was so inviting and cozy that we were still able to make the best of our weekend getaway. Dave and Kate were very communicative and thorough during the entire process and excellent to deal with. Looking forward to dealing with them again in the future.
We really enjoyed our stay! The house was super cute and had plenty of bedrooms/beds for my bachelorette party!
Beautiful big house with lots of space, plenty of beds, and in a great location!
Very nice place with plenty of room for families. we will be back!
Loved this place! Super cute house! The stairs are a little scary cuz of how tight they turn going up

The home was lovely, easy to find, centrally located and Kate was very responsive and congenial. It’s an older home so there’s some creaking in the floorboards. From the description, I was expecting some beach access from the backyard. That isn’t the case. You have to walk down the street. We were there in the winter so that wasn’t an issue. It was close enough to the main street and I was able to walk to get a latte in the morning at the local coffee shop. Loved that! The lake can be seen from the top floors, but there is a water treatment facility (or something) directly behind the house. There was plenty of space for my family and would have fit many more people. We enjoyed hanging out in the front living room and the kitchen table was amazing! Washer and dryer came in handy. It was in the only bathroom on the first floor, off of the kitchen. All in all, the house was great. I would come back to it, if I ever get the opportunity.
Alexa’s place was amazing. We went for an overnight stay and it was the perfect location! Definitely recommend!

The apartment had all the amenities needed. Even all the little extra things were taken care of and available. The pictures don’t do this place justice. The interior was very modern and pleasing but at the same time cozy. The location is perfect and close to everything we needed to relax a few days. The host communicated on a timely manner and had great recommendations. They also had lots of information tastefully placed throughout the house. All in all a great stay and will definitely be back there.

This place was immaculate. Everything was clean. It was a great location. Within a couple minutes of walking distance to downtown and very good restaurants and bakery. I am looking forward to going there again with my girlfriend. Thanks Alexa!

This truly is our home away from home. We always look forward to coming back here. Of all the places we've stayed during our travels, nothing compares to what Alexa and Audrey have created here at Harbor Haven. Bathrooms:
More towels and/or bigger towels provided
Kleenex boxes provided in all bathrooms
There was very little body wash left in each container and no shampoo/conditioner provided. I would suggest installing these units in each shower that have 3 compartments…1 for shower wash, 1 for shampoo, and 1 for conditioner. It would be easier to add to those rather than trying to keep up with replacing body wash containers.
Kitchen:
Personally, I suggest removing all candles from an Airbnb. As a fellow business person, having actual candles in an Airbnb seems like too much of a risk for potential issues…fires & burns. Not worth the risk.
Bedrooms:
Add TVs in each bedroom. These days TVs are cheap. Having large flatscreen TVs mounted on the walls is easy and very luxurious and desirable for families with children and teens.
Unit overall:
I would suggest providing Info either online or in unit itself on nearest grocery stores for essentials, as well as nearest pharmacy & hospitals/doc in the box for emergencies.

great stay - place was spotless and every necessity was in place. great location, too - right up the hill from the bridge street action. loved learning about the history of the house, too. THANKS!!

Great location in ashtabula. Close to restaurants and bars. Place is super cute and just as described in listing. Will definitely stay here next time I’m in town.

Thank you for sharing your beautiful home with us. We made some wonderful memories coming home to Ohio!

The place was AMAZING!! I am hoping to stay again this summer. I loved that they had all the things I might need from toothpaste to deodorant. It was also very spacious, love love love this place!
the place is great. but a 150 cleaning fee is ridiculous. the only reason we will nit book it again. not cool.

This is a beautiful and spacious place and my friends and I loved it! We were surprised by how much effort was put into the little things and it made our weekend stay that much more enjoyable :)
Beautiful location, very peaceful outside - gorgeous patio with firepit - very cozy! The indoor sitting rooms were so tranquil and calm. I would definitely stay here again!!

House was exactly as pictured - plenty of space, absolutely lovely, very very thoughtfully stocked for traveling guests, check in was super easy and smooth, and the host was very responsive. I can be quite particular and have not one complaint!!! I will stay here again.
This house was way better than expected! The owners were so thoughtful with what the house is stocked with and provided. It’s extremely clean and a great location!
Cozy, comfortable, and surprising spacious! We had a wonderful time and will be coming back.

We had an amazing time and loved all of the details and thought that went into this house! It is in a very cute and quiet neighborhood. We would definitely recommend this house to others and would definitely go back in the future!

The place was amazing and everything was clean! The location was great; very close to multiple beaches, less than 10 minutes to a gas station and grocery store, and lots of great places to eat! The attention to detail made our experience above and beyond. Would recommend.

Everything about our stay was perfect. The house was beautiful and so close to everything! First thing we noticed was how clean, I alway come prepared with my Lysol wipes and spray and they were 100% NOT needed! We will definitely be coming back!

This place is absolutely fantastic. We with a another couple for a quiet get away and could not have found a better place to say. Evenings on the patio, and mornings around the island for breakfast were perfect.

My family and I were looking for a close, but fun get away for the weekend and we couldn’t have picked a better place to stay. Kalyn’s home is exceptional. Highly recommend staying here!

Beautiful home very close to Lake Erie. Lot’s of space, very comfortable and clean. The kitchen is great and has everything we needed to prepare and cook big meals. This cottage is absolutely perfect! It was exceptionally clean, updated and had everything we could want. The kitchen is beautiful! Beautiful, clean, quiet stay with plenty of things to do. I would definitely stay here again and will recommend it to friends.

Home away from home, Kalyn thought of everything you would need and had it ready and stocked at the house. No need to pack anything but clothes! Clean sheets!! You could smell the cleanliness of the home in every room. Great location, you could see the lake from the front porch. Back patio was wonderful with nice seating, a lighted umbrella, and fire pit. Thank you for a great weekend getaway!

A great last minute weekend getaway. We were the first guests at this rental. It was so cute. The kitchen was well equipped and they had any toiletry you may have forgotten at home. Great outdoor seating on the porch and patio. We didn’t use the bikes but there are three beach cruisers and a cornhole set.
It was a quick walk to the water where there were beautiful sunsets. Just take the steps slow!
Great location to downtown Ashtabula and short rides to the surrounding wineries.
The communication with Amy, the manager, made everything smooth with check in and she made sure all our questions were answered.
Beautifully decorated house with full loaded kitchen. Walking distance to beach and Main Street. We would visit again.

By the far the best Airbnb we have ever been to. We are very picky when it comes to cleanliness and this home did not disappoint in any way. Samantha’s home was stocked with everything you need and more. The home is well organized and labels of where things belong and how to operate items within the home - definitely a nice touch!
We truly appreciated the impeccably organized, clean and design of this home! Best part of our visit!

We loved our stay in Samantha’s home. The decor is beautiful and also very cozy - a comfier bed than ours at home! Perfect size for us, our kids and my parents to enjoy. Sarah

great host and house highly recommend
This house is a gem in Ashtabula. It is very well adorned and feels so homey. There are plenty of amenities and extras, too! Our family enjoyed our time very much and will be back!

We had a great stay in Ashtabula and absolutely loved the house. It was perfect for our family of four (my wife, myself, toddler, and newborn). We LOVED the hydrangea house! Great location.

This house deserves 100 stars!!! Absolutely pristine and impeccable. From the minute you walk in, you can feel the welcoming atmosphere and the unmatched attention to detail. Thank you for sharing your beautiful home with us. We had a wonderful weekend. 😊🐾

We had an amazing stay! Everything in the house was labeled which was a huge help to navigating the house. Extremely clean and decorated adorably! Definitely would recommend to anyone. Perfect for kids and fur kids!
Everything about the house was first rate. It was a pleasure staying there and couldn't have expected more. I would highly recommend for any visitors to the area.

Beautiful home that had everything we needed, especially for cooking our own meals. Very convenient to local Ashtabula sights. Beds were very comfortable and the neighborhood quiet. I would highly recommend staying here to others.

We were hoping for a perfect getaway with our family, and we sure got it! We simply loved being able to walk and bike to the beach. Pickleball was an extra special experience, and we're convinced we'll become pros! The beach was remarkable, and Sam had everything you needed to enjoy the day! The neighbors were sweet, and biking riding on a calm lake street was something we don't always get but simply loved. The sense of community was really felt as we embraced Bridge Street. The shops were perfect and the restaurants were so excellent! I picked up a beautiful bracelet from a local artist. Truly... it's exquisite! Sam created a home that detailed everything a family or couple would need. The bedding, swings, decor, and furniture were impeccable! Her attention to detail and design are superior. She truly thought of everything you could ever need. It made our stay so wonderful, we can't wait to plan our next trip. Thank you for thinking of everything and making our trip wonderful! ❤️
wonderful place to stay when visiting Ashtabula

As beautiful as the pictures. Sam was a great host who went above and beyond to communicate and make us feel welcome. We loved being able to bring our dog, the fully equipped kitchen and being close to Bridge St. And while pet friendly the house was super clean. The lake is close but it still was about a 15-20 minute walk so it was a bit further than we thought it would be. It was a nice area, although some of the neighboring houses had a bit of a creepy vibe with their decorations (skulls, demon deer, hangman’s noose). Great stay overall and we would definitely stay again!

We loved our stay at Samantha's place!
The house was designed to details, very cozy and lovely!
The house had everything you will need on a trip, in case you forgot smthg, don't worry they have everything you'll need.
Very clean, everything looked brand new.
Close to the beach and to the town center!
We will definitely be back 😁

This was the best Airbnb I have stayed in, every detail was thought about. The place was so clean and organized. The host was very responsive if you ever need her. Just a 10 minute walk to the beach and a short drive to GOTL and many other wineries. When coming back to this area I would stay here again 10/10!

This home is perfectly appointed with anything and everything you could want. It's all labeled and easy to find. The neighborhood is quiet and tree lined street close to Walnut Blvd and the Harbor. Restaurants are a 5 minute drive and very convenient. We loved our stay and I can't wait to go back!!!

Beautiful home! Comfortable, cozy, and incredibly clean. The host has thought of everything. The decor is calming and serene, the linens are soft, the kitchen amenities are great. The bathrooms feel spa-like! Our family loved our stay at this cozy retreat and highly recommend it. We look forward to staying here again in the future!
Thanks Samantha for sharing your beautiful home!
Nice Location! Beautiful home.

We enjoyed our stay at this beautifully decorated home. We were welcomed with a gift, thank you card and ideas for things to do. We were in town for work trip and loved walking in the door after a long day. This home offers comfort, peace and represents a coastal energy as the lake is a stones throw away. There is a gorgeous swing in the living room and spent time enjoying that pleasure and one I haven’t seen before. If we are back in the area, we look forward to staying again.

Sam’ s house was perfect in every way- and the attention to detail was spot on.
Thank you for the delicious bottle of wine and please tell Ron Reggie says thank you for the special dog treats.
We will definitely stay here again for our next visit.
Such a lovely place, We will definitely be back!

We loved our stay at Point Breeze. Meeghan was very responsive when we had to contact her with a question.
It's an older home with lots of character and we enjoyed it a lot. The area is nice and quiet (even this busy week with the eclipse). We brought our dogs too, and they felt right at home. Walking distance to the beach was super great, too!
We would definitely consider Point Breeze again!

The Point Break House was perfect for the sporting event at the Spire. What I love about owners like Meeghan is that the time was taken to make it a truly unique home. The beach-inspired decore was thoughtfully placed throughout the home. The one night it rained I felt as if I was the beach. Thank you for sharing your home with my family!

We loved staying here with our 4 children over the holidays. The beds were very comfortable! Loved the preserved vintage style.
We walked to Harbor Perk and the Iroquois for the best coffee and pizza. My uncle has owned the Iroquois for many years and my cousin makes the pizza from scratch.
Also walked to the beach that’s a short distance from the house. Would be even better in the summer!
We had a wondering time here!
We really enjoyed ourselves. It was nice to be by the lake and checking out the bridge at night. We also had a chance to check out the coffee shop and the brewery.

We had a great time at Meeghan’s place. It was so tastefully decorated and everything we needed for a relaxing weekend was right there. They had a pickleball set and beach items ready to go in the closet for us which was so thoughtful. It was a 15ish minute walk to some great coffee shops and even closer to a nice beach, a playground, tennis and pickleball courts and a nice museum. We would definitely stay again!

We cannot say enough about our stay. The house was awesome! Walnut beach was amazing and so close to the house! The house was spotless and well stocked. The welcome binder was super helpful! We would love to visit again!

We loved Meghan’s place. It has lots of personality. Her instruction book was great. The beach is about a 20 minute walk unless there is a shortcut we missed. It is a lovely little beach. We just wish we had more time to enjoy the house. We LOVE the outdoor bathtub!!

We stayed at Point Break while in town visiting family, our second stay at this house and it is so comfortable!
This will definitely be our place to stay any time we come to Ashtabula. The house is incredibly clean, the beds are very comfortable, the kitchen has everything you need, and we especially liked using the beach equipment for a fun day at Walnut Beach.

This was our second stay at Point Break for our family vacation. We love being able to walk to the beach, library, marine museum, and Bridge St. with local eateries and shops. The house was spotless and perfect for a beach trip. The kids bathed in backyard tub and played in the game room/garage, which also helped to keep the place clean and free of sand. It’s a great place to get away and relax. We have created so many family memories staying here. We can’t wait to return.

Meeghan was a great host. Check-in was very easy, the house was very clean and Meeghan included a notebook with easy to follow instructions about the house and information about the area.
I would recommend staying at Point Break. It is a short walk to Walnut Beach and a great area to ride bikes. We enjoyed going to the Wine and Walleye Festival and going to the restaurants in Ashtabula during our stay.

Meeghan’s home was so cute and very cozy! We loved discovering all of the artistic, vintage, and repurposed items in the house. The board games and converted garage provided hours of fun for our kids on a stormy night. The house was well-stocked and very clean, and the description is accurate—it’s true that the basement bathroom is only for those comfortable with stairs and really just a stall and adjacent utility sink, but it was surprisingly immaculate and not a problem for us. We were also very close to the beach and to town. I’m so happy we found Meeghan’s place!

Our family absolutely loved this home. The atmosphere was great, the decor/style was unique and so lovely. Meeghan and Ryan were great and very helpful with any questions or concerns. A definite return stay on our next trip to wine and covered bridge country.

We had a lovely stay here visiting family for the Fourth of July weekend. Meeghan’s place was perfect. I don’t think the pictures do it justice! The home has great touches and the neighborhood is very pretty. Check in was easy and the house was very clean, and I really appreciated Meeghan’s binder of recommendations and house info. This is my third year staying in this area for the 4th and Meeghan’s spot is my favorite place we’ve stayed!

We had a great time staying at this AirB&B for 3 nights. Everything was perfect. Loved the decor and all the amenities. Of course our favorite room was the garage. We just loved it. Great location - close to the beach.
It was a girls weekend. The house was pristine. Love all the decor. Beds were comfortable. So close to Walnut Beach which was our desired spot. Would stay again.

It was a beautiful house with lots of whimsical art pieces and color. This place was spotless and had everything we needed for our long weekend. It was refreshing to sit on the front porch each morning and drink my coffee, and take in the lake breeze. Very peaceful and relaxing

I stayed at Meeghan’s place for several weeks this spring. I absolutely loved it. This is a wonderful little town on Lake Erie close to so many things - hiking at Erie Bluffs state park, covered bridges, sunrise walks on Walnut Beach just a few blocks away. There are lovely little shops close to the house that include a cafe with local coffee, farm to table provisions, chocolate and beer! The house itself was wonderful, so tastefully done and welcoming to a weary traveler. The beds were comfortable with hotel quality sheets and pillows. The kitchen has everything needed and I loved the dining table, it definitely took my morning oatmeal to the next level. Thank you so much Meeghan!

We had a great stay at Point Break! As soon as we stepped inside, we felt right at home. The house is bright and cheerful, and has great character along with some cool art pieces throughout the house. All of the amenities we needed for a comfortable and cozy stay were provided, along with some treats from the host which were appreciated! We loved being able to walk to the beach and we enjoyed some great restaurants and shops which were also within walking distance. We will definitely be back when we return to the area!

We had a wonderful time staying at Point Break! The decor was just beautiful. You could tell that there had been a lot of thought put into each piece of artwork and furniture that was there. We loved the grape Jelly made by our host! The house was spotlessly clean, which is something that we look for in an Air B & B. We would highly recommend staying here!

Our stay was great. Meegan’s place was beautiful and squeaky clean. It is walking distance to the lake and great restaurants close by. Her place was well equipped for our month long stay. The neighborhood is beautiful and peaceful. Meegan was very quick to respond to any questions. I highly recommend staying here.
Meghan’s place was great! The home was lovely and the neighborhood was very nice. We had a great time. Thanks Meeghan!
The house was perfect, a lot of character! I love older homes and this one is a gem! Thank you for going out of your way to bring us firewood and even homemade jelly!!!
We felt right at home. Will definitely stay here again!

This place was lovely! Just as described- very clean and comfortable in a great location right by the lake.
We loved the fireplace and Meghan provided plenty of wood.
Meghan was so responsive and helpful. When there was an issue with the internet provider she went above and beyond to provide short-term and long-term fixed as soon as possible. She also made sure the driveway was cleared after the snow. A wonderful host and stay!
Loved every moment of it. From walking in the door to a beautiful home, decorated so well, they definitely put a lot of time and effort into that home. Paid close attention to detail!

Megan's place in Ashtabula was amazing and magical! Every corner hides another treasure making us wish for the weather turn to awful so that we might discover more. The kitchen, dining room, sitting room and bedrooms were perfectly sized, and the decorating style and amazing color combinations were just so, well, soothing and a feast to the spirit. I don't know if this area of our country has a "style" but this very well could be IT. I really need to come back to enjoy the game room and definitely need to enjoy the bath tub in the back garden which was also heartwarming
As the weather was gorgeous, we had to head to the shoppes on Bridge Street which were delightful as were the restaurants. The beach at Walnut /Park was perfect for a morning and evening stroll to see the sunset and just right waves. I was treated to a perfect Sunday morning sunrise when I went down to the harbor to see both the drawbridge rise just as the sun was rising. The beach, shoppes and restaurants are within bike or walking distance. The neighborhood was friendly and welcoming.
A dozen or so wineries are in the area. Geneva on the Lake was close to enough for a visit. Beach parks are located every couple of miles.
A truly wonderful place to stay. And as if all this isn't enough..... I truly felt that bringing our dogs with us was perfectly ok. Some of the AirBnb say its ok but don't really welcome pups. And the homemade grape jelly was a sweet treat! Thank you.

Beautiful, quirky, charming! The house is well appointed, and the hosts are very communicative and accommodating. Really enjoyed the inspired decorating touches, Meegan has done a great job of giving the house a unique vibe.
The house is set up perfectly for a small group of friends to visit and explore the Ashtabula Harbor area.
The decor is awesome and everything is nicely stocked! Would stay again!
Pictures do NOT do the decor and furniture justice! Everything was so amazing, I wish I could stay forever! Everything was comfortable and we had everything we could possibly need for our stay!
Had a wonderful stay! The home was extremely clean, comfortable and serene. The area is gorgeous and I loved how close a walk it is to the beach. Meeghan was attentive and helpful with my inquiries.
Loved the eclectic yet homey "vibe" of this home! We wanted to experience Lake Erie and and this was the absolute perfect location. Love love love Ashtulus!
Thank you
The location is fantastic- easy walk or drive to a wonderful beach. Meeghan was quick to respond. We had a wonderful trip and enjoyed our stay!

We had a wonderful time staying at Meeghan's house! Very comfortable accommodations with everything we needed at our fingertips. Great location, peaceful and quiet and so close to the Walnut Beach and walking distance to little shops and restaurants.
Thank you Meeghan!

Absolutely wonderful! Meeghan was EXTREMELY attentive in communication, but also in the adorable and hospitable details around the home. Extremely homey and comfortable. The walk to the lake beach was quaint and easy access.
10/10 would recommend.

What a perfect beautiful quaint home!! This was my first time using airBnb and I couldn’t of asked for a better experience. I brought my mom and daughter up for a little girls trip to celebrate my moms retirement. We were able to walk to the beach. All the places we ate at were within 5 minutes of the home. The kitchen has seriously anything you would ever need for cooking and all the condiments. And we loved the fact that there were beach towels, beach bags, & sand toys for my daughter, and tubes to float on in the lake. That was so nice to have!!
We plan on making this a yearly trip now and highly recommend point break!!!!! ThAnk you for an amazing experience, and Sharing your home.
We enjoyed our visit very much! We had everything we needed, plus extra stuff like games!!

This house was incredibly cool! Colorful and artistic say it all. Comfortable bedding, the kitchen has everything you need (down to spices, oil and a brita water pitcher in the fridge!) for a family to enjoy their time.

My family will absolutely be renting this house again, when we come into town.

Point Break is a wonderful get away location. We come into town once a year for the Wine &Walleye Festival, and this house is perfectly located within walking distance of all the festival activities. Check-in was easy and we had everything provided that we would need for the weekend. Beds were very comfortable, and the house was impeccably clean!

Great location! Near water and extra amenities, such as beach towels, tubes, tennis rackets, etc! Quaint house with an artistic flair! Nice place to unwind after a hard working day! Thank you very much!
Very cute and artsy place! Very close to beach and town. Less than a minute drive to beach. Few blocks for walking. Nice outdoor seating. Would recommend

Point break is a home away from home. House is perfect size, has everything you need. Its close to many attractions, by biking or walking. Short drive to local landmarks. Downtown businesses were worth eating at and purchasing special gifts.

This property is our family's new favorite vacation spot. The house was incredibly clean, and the location was prefect. And we used the converted garage for a play room during the day and game room when the kids were in bed.
The hospitality was great. Meeghan was very communicative and promptly answered our questions.
Not only is the house exactly as described, but it's essentially an art museum. Every furnishing is authentic, and it's clear that each piece of decor was chosen (or repurposed) with careful thought. I couldn't recommend this place enough.
Beautiful house!

Meghan’s place was wonderful! The house was spotlessly clean, and every room was truly a work of art. My family and I loved walking to Walnut Beach, and exploring the downtown/harbor Ashtabula area (both minutes away)! The area was peaceful, but there was plenty to do. I would definitely recommended Meeghan’s place to anyone who wants to a relaxing getaway in great little town!

This is our fourth summer randomly choosing an Airbnb and going on an adventure! Meghan’s place was by far (without a doubt ) the best and most accommodating Airbnb we’ve stayed in!
As a family of five, there were so many things we appreciated that we had not experienced in other homes. From cleaning supplies, an accessible washer and dryer, paper towels, dish soap, ice cubes and cold water, etc. Those necessary items made our trip so much easier and relaxing.
The area of Ashtabula is beautiful, clean, friendly, and accommodating! I grew up in southern, Florida and I found the beaches of Lake Erie to be WONDERFUL!
My husband and I personally loved the artistic beauty of how perfectly decorated this house was. Just sitting and enjoying the personalized pieces of art and furniture was so neat! We cannot wait to stay here again!
Andrea W.

This is the place you want to stay in Ashtabula. Our family loved our time at Point Break. We played games in the garage, ate takeout on the “swirly sunset” table, and walked to the beach every night for the sunset and to find beach glass. Meeghan is an excellent host, and the details of the place are so much fun. Highly recommend.

Meeghan place was clean and well stock. We enjoyed the garage entertainment room. The place is walking distance to Walnut Beach, Hubbard House Underground Railroad Museum and Ashtabula Maritime Museum. We will be back!
This is a great place just a short walk to the beach and the excellent harbor area. Many beautiful and historic homes on the walk. Short drive to GOTL too. Meeghan is great host!

Wonderful place to stay and just as described in the listing. The neighborhood is very walkable and close to the beach and restaurants. The house is charming and met our needs very well. I highly recommend Meeghan's place!
Truly a wonderful spot, exactly as described and pictured. Great hosts who were super accomodating and helpful. We will definitely be back in the future, thank you!
House was a perfect location for us. Cozy and extremely clean!
Well appointed adorable home. Loved the antique pieces in the house. Great location! Hosts were amazing and great communication.

Simple. Accurate. Easy. My former roommate and I got our small families together for a 1/2 way meet up. We spent the weekend at the park and utilized the game room. Meeghan truly makes this an effortless adventure. I would stay again if we return to Ashtabula.

Charming and unique home within a short walk to Walnut Beach. This home is full of eclectic decor and artwork. Large master bedroom with desk, second and third bedrooms are small yet cozy. Very responsive and accommodating hosts who have done an amazing job making Point Break a relaxing getaway. Our one regret is that the weather wasn’t warmer - we would have spent more time in the garage-turned-rec room, which is flawlessly decorated.
It is one of my favorite homes in the area! I had stayed there once before and was again very pleased with everything!

Would highly recommend staying here and hope to return! Impeccably, artistically decorated with fun touches throughout the historic space that make it truly feel like a home. Very clean and in a fantastic location that is either a 1-3 minute drive or walkable to both the beach and dining/shopping downtown. Suspect Meeghan/Ryan may live next door, so appreciated their proximity to resolve issues if needed (we didn't have any!), but absolutely felt we had the home and outdoor space to ourselves for a birthday weekend getaway. Appreciated being able to bring our dog and will definitely be back!
House was as shown in pictures.
Very lovely home. Accurate description which we appreciate. Overall great stay.

This listing ticked boxes I didn't even know I had and, by far, is the most authentic home I've vacationed in. There's such love, care, and cozy comfort packed in it. Cleanliness was also on point and the little goodies in the kitchen were so sweet. The only possible regret I have is that we didn't first experience this home in the warmer months. But we'll definitely be back!

The house was clean and very cute.
We wanted a quick, relaxing, get away over Thanksgiving break and that's what we got.
Host was very prompt and it was a very nice place.

Meeghan and Ryan were great hosts! The house was in a perfect location in the Harbor. I loved all the personal historical and artistic touches in the house. A huge wow was a shower that fit my 6’7 husband. Most older houses it’s in a small corner and he has to duck to take a shower and the shower head is at his chest. We will definitely be back next trip to Ashtabula, Ohio.
This was great stay- everything is just as pictured and very clean. Kitchen is very well stocked. Just a short walk to the beach!

We had a very pleasant stay and the house was adorable! We also appreciated being able to bring our dog, and it was so nice to have the beach just across the street and hiking/biking trails not far away. Meeghan was very helpful and responsive, and we would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in the Ashtabula area!!
Lovely home possibly haunted. My housemates and I heard some ghost like sounds. However great house

This is a great place to enjoy Lake Erie in a quiet neighborhood. It is beautifully decorated. Meeghan keeps the place stocked with just the right amenities, even a beach umbrella, chairs and towels for a visit to the beach.

The house is nicely decorated and amazingly clean. The walk to the beach is short enough for a 5 year old and through a pleasant neighborhood. The beach is really nice, with dunes, wildlife, clear water and a sandy bottom (once you get beyond a few rocks). Everything necessary for cooking, cleaning, and other conveniences was available on site. It was a wonderful stay.

Meghan’s home was filled with artistic touches everywhere. The space was great for our family of four. It is very close to the beach, downtown Ashtabula, and only about 15-20 minutes to Geneva on the Lake. Meghan was very responsive. Our stay provided us with exactly what we needed…good quality family time.
Great house and great location.
Great place to stay! About 10 minute drive to GOTL, 2 minute drive to the beach

This beautifully furnished home is just what you are looking for if you want a relaxing getaway close to the beach and other fun, family friendly activities. The neighborhood is beautiful and very walkable. You can’t go wrong with choosing Meeghan as your host!
Great place. Highly recommend it! Would definitely stay again.

We would absolutely recommend this place to anybody. Colorful, beautiful, artistic, clean and organized. You can tell a lot of effort and care was put in to make your stay a wonderful experience. It was literally a minute drive to a cozy beach where we saw the most beautiful sunset and rainbow across Lake Erie.
Quaint place! Located walking distance from the beach and only few minutes drive to area restaurants. Great communication with host. Overall a wonderful and hassle-free trip.

Great place to stay, clean, cozy, and meticulously decorated. The location is great, close enough to get to all the attractions but far enough away to enjoy peace and quiet and we are from a town with 1000 people so that's saying something. Walking distance from beach, couple and family friendly. Check it out!

This was a great place to stay! It was my first time in the area and Meeghan was a fantastic host. She was very friendly and informative if things to do in the areaThe house was very clean, organized and had everything we needed during our stay. 10/10 we will definitely be back!!

That said, the cabin didn't quite hit the mark for us. The location is a bit awkward - surrounded by gravel and overlooking a baseball diamond, with Lake Erie technically visible but certainly too far to be enjoyable from the porch. There was no kitchen table (TV trays were available), the sheets and blankets were very thin over an uneven mattress, we were unable to find any provided bath soap or shampoo, and the water heater was too small to take back-to-back warm showers.
None of these items are dealbreakers since the cleanliness and newness of the property offset some of the weak points. But hopefully this helps others know what to expect!
